title: Mediterranean Rice Salad
ingredients: ['190g uncooked long grain brown rice', '600ml water', '1 avocado, peeled, pitted and diced', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 vine-ripened tomatoes, diced', '200g diced cucumbers', '50g diced red onion', '75g crumbled feta cheese', '4 tablespoons sliced Kalamata olives', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh mint', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '1/2 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper']
